entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet tool install` on non-tool package causes DirectoryNotFoundException #37010
  • Self-Contained publish still need user to download .NET runtime after upgrading from .NET 7 to 8 #37005
  • Object reference not set error when trying to use "dotnet new bepinex5plugin" with .NET 8, works with .NET 7 #36991
  • dotnet 8 SDK uninstalls dotnet 7 #36990
  • The .NET 8.0 SDK can't run built binary with `./Test`, but works with `dotnet ./Test.dll` #36985

Closed

  • IIS Express project fails to build with error "Reference to type 'IPEndPoint' claims it is defined in 'System.Net.Primitives', but it could not be found" #36967
  • React template for 8.0 seems to be missing #36969
  • NETSDK1204 error during dotnet clean on macOS when AoT enabled #36960
  • [Bug]: Product version info is shown with error in the exe properties Details for .NET 8.0 #36975

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37006
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Don't overwrite user-provided ContainerUser values #36974
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.1
  • Fix comment on MicrosoftDotNetXliffTasksVersion #36992
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • add missing --archiveoutputpath option to .NET Framework container tool task #36652
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Bump dockercredsprovider to pick up a bugfix #36707
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Freeze Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver assembly version #36733
    untriaged
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2317938 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Target NetStandard2.1 in BrowserRefresh #36981
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
